page.title: 12THE DOWTY FARM SHOP
page.content: {The Dowty Farm Shop}is on the A449 dual carriage way. The shop has traded for 60 years and claims to be the {first farm shop in Britain.}The owner has large farms nearby and the shop is an important outlet for his produce. The{premises}comprise a large car-park The buildings are large and contain display areas for a whole{range}of produce, such as vegtables, fruit, gardening tools, compost, flowers, sweets and wine. The other side of the business provides{packaging}materials for local farmers such as potatoe bags, carboard boxies, plastic bags etc. The business is{open}all year 7 days a week from 8.30 am to 5.30 pm and they employ 13 staff. 60% of the trade is by passing travelers and 40% is for local demand.
